cn.domob.android.ads

接口 AdEventListener


  • public interface AdEventListener
    Call method "setAdEventListener" of a instance of DomobAdView to set event listener.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onAdClicked(AdView adView)
      Indicate that ad has been clicked according to domob's rule(some misbehaviors will be filtered)
      void onAdFailed(AdView adView, AdManager.ErrorCode code)
      Callback when ad view failed to get new ad.
      void onAdOverlayDismissed(AdView adView)
      Callback when ad view will dismiss a modal view that covered current screen.
      void onAdOverlayPresented(AdView adView)
      Callback when ad view will present a modal view that will cover current screen.
      android.content.Context onAdRequiresCurrentContext()
      Callback when ad view need CURRENT Context to present modal view.
      void onEventAdReturned(AdView adView)
      Callback when ad view get new ad by requesting.
      void onLeaveApplication(AdView adView)
      Indicate that ad has caused the device to switch to different application

    • 方法详细资料

      • onEventAdReturned

        void onEventAdReturned(AdView adView)
        Callback when ad view get new ad by requesting.
        参数:
        adView -

      • onAdFailed

        void onAdFailed(AdView adView,
              AdManager.ErrorCode code)
        Callback when ad view failed to get new ad.
        参数:
        adView -
        errorCode - type of failure

      • onAdOverlayPresented

        void onAdOverlayPresented(AdView adView)
        Callback when ad view will present a modal view that will cover current screen.
        参数:
        adView -

      • onAdOverlayDismissed

        void onAdOverlayDismissed(AdView adView)
        Callback when ad view will dismiss a modal view that covered current screen.
        参数:
        adView -

      • onLeaveApplication

        void onLeaveApplication(AdView adView)
        Indicate that ad has caused the device to switch to different application
        参数:
        adView -
        从以下版本开始:
        domob android sdk 3.1.2

      • onAdClicked

        void onAdClicked(AdView adView)
        Indicate that ad has been clicked according to domob's rule(some misbehaviors will be filtered)
        参数:
        adView -
        从以下版本开始:
        domob android sdk 3.1.2

      • onAdRequiresCurrentContext

        android.content.Context onAdRequiresCurrentContext()
        Callback when ad view need CURRENT Context to present modal view.
        返回:
        CURRENT Context。
